alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Lower Iberia; Lower St. Martin; Lower St. Mary; St. Landry; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper St. Mary; Upper Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 7:58AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong winds behind a line of thunderstorms will impact portions of Iberia, eastern Lafayette, St. Mary, St. Martin and southeastern St. Landry Parishes through 830 AM CDT... At 757 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Port Allen to 7 miles southwest of Amelia. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, New Iberia, Opelousas, Morgan City, Catahoula, Breaux Bridge, Franklin, Carencro, St. Martinville, Patterson, Jeanerette, Berwick, Krotz Springs, Leonville, Arnaudville, Belle River, Bayou Vista, Avery Island, Burns Point and Cypremort Point. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 103 and 128. Interstate 49 between mile markers 1 and 7, near mile marker 11, and between mile markers 19 and 27. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lafayette; Lower Iberia; Lower St. Martin; Lower St. Mary; St. Landry; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper St. Mary; Upper Vermilion
